Containers.Name: DUC
Containers.Description: [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Description[/span][/u][/b][br] Duc is a small library and a collection of tools for inspecting and visualizing disk usage (and now contains duplicate file matching).[br][br] Duc maintains a database of accumulated sizes of directories of your file system, and allows you to query this database with some tools, or create fancy graphs showing you where your bytes are.[br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/data[/b] This path is used to index your filesystem - strongly suggest READ ONLY[br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Getting Started[/span][/u][/b][br] Start by visiting the WebUI - it defaults to your http://yourserver:2112) and clicking "reindex" (be patient, it can take a few minutes (or longer) to run the full index.[br][br]
